example: The benevolent woman donated a large sum to the local shelter.

meaning: a harsh, discordant mixture of sounds
example: The cacophony of the city traffic kept him awake all night.
She gave a candid assessment of the team's performance.

meaning: showing care and effort in your work or duties
example: He is a diligent student who always completes his assignments on time.

meaning: lasting for a very short time
example: The beauty of the sunset was ephemeral, fading quickly into the night.

meaning: happening by accident or chance rather than design
example: Their fortuitous meeting led to a wonderful partnership.
She was a gregarious person who loved to host large parties.

meaning: having a lively, cheerful, and self-confident manner
example: He walked in with a jaunty step, full of energy.

meaning: showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise
example: Her meticulous nature made her a great editor.
His quixotic quest to change the world often resulted in disappointment.
